Enumeration Type Documentation

enum APS_SkkeStatus_t

Status values as a result of the SKKE protocol. See ZigBee Specification r19, Table 4.10, page 448.

The APS layer provides services that allow two devices to establish a mutual link key. Initial trust information (for example, a master key) must be installed on each device prior to running the key establishment procedure. See ZigBee Specification r19, 4.4.2, page 441.

Enumerator:
APS_SKKE_SUCCESS_STATUS 

No errors occured .

APS_SKKE_INVALID_PARAMETER_STATUS 

An invalid parameter was input to one of the key establishment primitives.

APS_SKKE_NO_MASTER_KEY_STATUS 

No master key is available.

APS_SKKE_INVALID_CHALLENGE_STATUS 

Challenge is invalid:

  • Initiator during action step 3 (sub-clause B.7.1),
  • Responder during action step 3 (sub-clause B.7.2).
APS_SKKE_INVALID_SKG_STATUS 

SKG outputs invalid:

  • Initiator during action step 4 (sub-clause B.7.1),
  • Responder during action step 3 (sub-clause B.7.2).
APS_SKKE_INVALID_MAC_STATUS 

MAC transformation outputs invalid:

  • Initiator during action step 8 (sub-clause B.7.1),
  • Responder during action step 10 (sub-clause B.7.2).
APS_SKKE_INVALID_KEY_STATUS 

Tag checking transformation outputs invalid:

  • Initiator during action step 12 (sub-clause B.7.1),
  • Responder during action step 8 (sub-clause B.7.2).
APS_SKKE_TIMEOUT_STATUS 

Either the initiator or responder waits for the next expected incoming message for time greater than the apsSecurityTimeOutPeriod attribute of the AIB.

APS_SKKE_BAD_FRAME_STATUS 

Either the initiator or responder receives an SKKE frame out of order.

APS_SKKE_NOT_PERMITTED_STATUS 

Invalid global state of APS layer.

APS_SKKE_1_TX_ERROR_STATUS 

Transmission of SKKE-1 command frame is failure.

APS_SKKE_2_TX_ERROR_STATUS 

Transmission of SKKE-2 command frame is failure.

APS_SKKE_3_TX_ERROR_STATUS 

Transmission of SKKE-3 command frame is failure.

APS_SKKE_4_TX_ERROR_STATUS 

Transmission of SKKE-4 command frame is failure.

APS_SKKE_SET_LINK_KEY_ERROR_STATUS 

Error saving new link key.

APS_SKKE_NO_SHORT_ADDR_STATUS 

Short address of key establish partner is not found.
